name: Catarsis: Prologue
description:
In this action rogue-like game, survive evil robot attacks, gain XP by killing them and upgrade your weapons and character for the next room. It's all about strategy, reflexes, and smart choices.

Gain XP by killing evil robots and upgrade your character!



Buy and upgrade your weapons and equipment!



Exciting Action-Packed Roguelike Gameplay!




Careful choice of weapons and character abilities will be the key to winning!

THE STORY

Humans and advanced robots have been living in peace and harmony for centuries. But everything was about to change with a group of powerful and evil robots declaring war on humanity.

The evil robots, who began to think they no longer needed humans, gathered in the Net Building and produced mini robots to serve their wicked purposes. Then they launched a very devilish war on humanity at the most unexpected moment. The situation was awful…

Only Paw Lab, the most advanced laboratory in the Catarsis universe, could stop them. Scientists of Paw Lab had been fearlessly trying to develop a new type of robot that could be their savior that could be controlled by mental power, but the tests had been failing and failing... The war was coming to an end and humanity was on the verge of extinction.

Then something happened that no one expected! One night, the laboratory's cat, Nyx, while handling its catlike duties of eating, sleeping, and knocking things over, entered the pre-robot prototype. Those who came to the laboratory in the morning could not believe their eyes. Nyx was controlling the pre-robot that they had been testing for months but had failed to operate!

Could the pre-robots prepared by the scientists, along with the cats, succeed in defeating the evil robots and their devilish army?
